Side Effects: Horrible constipation_ low blood pressure_ low heart rate_ dizziness
Comments: This medication is dangerous if you're small and your BP runs on the low end of normal like me. It made my heart rate and blood pressure go down to the point where I almost fainted. The constipation it caused_ along with the effexor constipation_ was unbearable. Plus it stopped working after 2 weeks. I see so many success stories about how it's helped people with their PTSD and anxiety_ I'm unfortunately not one of them.
